amendment.description: An amendment to insert a new section at the end of the bill to include additional appropriations to provide funds for the Contingency Emergency Reserve.

action.text: Mr. Rogers (KY) raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A020). Mr. Rogers (KY) stated that the amendment was not in order under clause 2 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Obey.
